00370 template <class Element>
00371 inline Element TVarVector<Element>::GetDotProduct(const TVarVector<Element>& vector) const
00372 {
00373        I_ASSERT(GetElementsCount() == vector.GetElementsCount());
00374 
00375        Element retVal = 0.0;
00376 
00377        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00378        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00379               retVal +=  m_elements[i] * vector.m_elements[i];
00380        }
00381 
00382        return retVal;

00510 template <class Element>
00511 inline TVarVector<Element> TVarVector<Element>::operator-() const
00512 {
00513        TVarVector<Element> retVal;
00514 
00515        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00516 
00517        retVal.resize(elementsCount);
00518        I_ASSERT(GetElementsCount() == retVal.GetElementsCount());
00519 
00520        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00521               retVal.m_elements[i] = -m_elements[i];
00522        }
00523 
00524        return retVal;

00626 template <class Element>
00627 void TVarVector<Element>::SetElementsFrom(const TVarVector& vector, const Element& expansionValue)
00628 {
00629        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00630        int minElements = istd::Min(elementsCount, vector.GetElementsCount());
00631 
00632        for (int i = 0; i < minElements; ++i){
00633               SetElement(i, vector[i]);
00634        }
00635 
00636        for (int i = minElements; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00637               SetElement(i, expansionValue);
00638        }
00639 }

00642 template <class Element>
00643 Element TVarVector<Element>::GetElementsSum() const
00644 {
00645        Element retVal = 0;
00646 
00647        for (int i = 0; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00648         retVal += m_elements[i];
00649     }
00650 
00651        return retVal;
00652 }

00655 template <class Element>
00656 bool TVarVector<Element>::Normalize(Element length)
00657 {
00658     Element isLength = GetLength();
00659 
00660     Element proportion = isLength / length;
00661 
00662        if (::fabs(proportion) > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00663               int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00664 
00665         for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00666             m_elements[i] = m_elements[i] / proportion;
00667         }
00668 
00669               return true;
00670     }
00671        else{
00672               return false;
00673        }
00674 }

00677 template <class Element>
00678 void TVarVector<Element>::GetMinimal(const TVarVector<Element>& vector, TVarVector<Element>& result) const
00679 {
00680        int elementsCount = istd::Min(GetElementsCount(), vector.GetElementsCount());
00681 
00682        result.SetElementsCount(elementsCount);
00683 
00684        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00685               result.SetElement(i, istd::Min(GetElement(i), vector.GetElement(i)));
00686        }
00687 }

00690 template <class Element>
00691 void TVarVector<Element>::GetMaximal(const TVarVector<Element>& vector, TVarVector<Element>& result) const
00692 {
00693        int elementsCount = istd::Min(GetElementsCount(), vector.GetElementsCount());
00694 
00695        result.SetElementsCount(elementsCount);
00696 
00697        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00698               result.SetElement(i, istd::Max(GetElement(i), vector.GetElement(i)));
00699        }
00700 }

00702 
00703 template <class Element>
00704 bool TVarVector<Element>::GetNormalized(TVarVector<Element>& result, Element length) const
00705 {
00706     Element isLength = GetLength();
00707 
00708     Element proportion = isLength / length;
00709 
00710        if (::fabs(proportion) > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00711               int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00712 
00713               result.m_elements.resize(elementsCount);
00714 
00715         for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00716             result.m_elements[i] = m_elements[i] / proportion;
00717         }
00718 
00719               return true;
00720     }
00721        else{
00722               return false;
00723        }
00724 }

00726 
00727 template <class Element>
00728 bool TVarVector<Element>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00729 {
00730        bool retVal = true;
00731 
00732        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00733 
00734        static iser::CArchiveTag elementsTag("Elements", "List of vector element");
00735        static iser::CArchiveTag elementTag("Element", "Single vector element");
00736 
00737        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginMultiTag(elementsTag, elementTag, elementsCount);
00738 
00739        if (!retVal){
00740               return false;
00741        }
00742 
00743        if (!archive.IsStoring()){
00744               m_elements.resize(elementsCount);
00745        }
00746 
00747     for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00748               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(elementTag);
00749               retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_elements[i]);
00750               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(elementTag);
00751        }
00752 
00753        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(elementsTag);
00754 
00755        return retVal;
00756 }
